Class LogInController

project.chenlin_17.Controller.LogInController
public class LogInController extends Object
This class is the controller of the log in page

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This function sets the basic setting required for this scene.
      It contains the default value for the button clicking music.
      It contains the basic setting for warning alert dialog.
      It contains the intended file name set for read and write.
      It contains the hashmap initialization for the username ane their unique password.

    • initializeHash

      private HashMap<String,String> initializeHash()
      Returns:
      initialized hashmap with user name and corresponding password stored

    • createWarning

      private javafx.scene.control.Alert createWarning(String title, String header)
      This function sets the default viewing for warning window.
      It is created for maintainability.
      Parameters:
      title - stands for the warning title name
      header - stands for the warning header name
      Returns:
      the newly created warning type that already had the title and header set.

    • HandleSubmitButtonAction

      public void HandleSubmitButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This function checks whether the username and the password are valid.
      If not valid, the warning alert will be shown.
      If is valid, the player will be directed to the index page with the username set.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

    • checkNull

      private boolean checkNull(String value)
      This function checks whether the player has input text or not.
      Parameters:
      value - the player's input box
      Returns:
      the state of the judging result

    • checkStatus

      private void checkStatus(String name, String password)
      This function checks whether the name and the password are valid.
      If the name and the password are new, then it will be newly added into the file.
      If the name and the password corresponds, then the player will be directed to the index page with the user's name set.
      If the name and the password doesn't correspond, the warning message will be shown
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      password - player stored password

    • writeBack

      private void writeBack(String name, String password)
      This function writes the newly added username to the existing file.
      There may exists file open exceptions.
      Parameters:
      name - the user's input name
      password - the user's input password
